"I am still excited about this game," Allen Iverson said. I feel like I could still play another 48 minutes. The crowd was against us and it was just great playing in that kind of atmosphere. This was my first one, and I would love to play in a lot more. " Allen Iverson told me he got 15 minutes of sleep last night, that was 15 more than I expected," said 76ers coach Larry Courtney Lee , who took his record sixth different organization to the playoffs. There's also the issue of the News Corp takeover of BSkyB and the apparent attempts by Jeremy Hunt, the Culture Secretary, to let that go through without proper scrutiny, and finally there's the extraordinary conduct of the police. Mr Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 after the paper's former royal editor, Clive Goodman , and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for phone hacking.
